metadata.title: CVE-2019-19709 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - low
metadata.description:
MediaWiki through 1.33.1 allows attackers to bypass the Title_blacklistprotection mechanism by starting with an arbitrary title, establishing anon-resolvable redirect for the associated page, and using redirect=1 inthe action API when editing that page.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-19709` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mediawiki - 1:1.31.6-1
mediawiki-classes - 1:1.31.6-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.31.6-1').
